ovdesc.p: Parameter file with ID as SYSTEM to define priorities for standard settlement instructions.

The priority of search is done using four fields namely STOCK.EXCHANGE, ISIN.COUNTRY, PL.SETT and SECURITY. Once the priority is defined, SSI search will happen for various combinations of fixed parameters in consideration with priority set.
Another field will hold the search combination based on the priority set and separated by asterisk.

desc.p: Numeric field and will accept priority number less than 5.It indicates what priority has been Assigned to field STOCK.EXCHANGE
Numeric field and will accept priority number less than 5.It indicates what priority has been Assigned to field PL.SETT
Numeric field and will accept priority number less than 5.It indicates what priority has been Assigned to field SECURITY
Numeric field and will accept priority number less than 5.It indicates what priority has been Assigned to field ISIN.CTRY
Multivalue field and will hold the priority list formed using the 4 fields(Stock Exchange, PL.Sett, Security and Isin Country. Value will be held in format STKEXCH*PL.SETT*SECURITY*ISIN.CTRY
